io.cucumber.core.logging

Class LoggerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cucumber.core.logging.LoggerFactory

  • public final class LoggerFactory
extends Object
    Cucumber uses the Java Logging APIs from java.util.logging (JUL).

    See the LogManager for configuration options or use the JUL to SLF4J Bridge
